Articles.Content:
xXLeGoldFishXx and myself are currently working on a song and we have hit a hurdle. Goldfish and myself are looking for someone who is very experienced and knows how to play, Someone who has some way of recording it in clear quality.

If you are interested please Pm myself for the song you will be playing and for any further questions.

-L3GO

xXLeGoldFishXx and myself are currently working on a song and we have hit a hurdle. Goldfish and myself are looking for someone who is very experienced and knows how to play, Someone who has some way of recording it in clear quality.

If you are interested please Pm myself for the song you will be playing and for any further questions.

-L3GO

Yeah if you could help out we'd really appreciate it! And of course we'll give you credit where credit is due!

I make music!

My computer has a decent keyboard attached, with some good textures (the usual - regular piano noises, plus pads and synths). Am I to compose my bit myself, harmonizing off the melody you set up (which would be fine) or are you to give me a sheet of music to play (which would also be fine)?

Looking forwards to this! It will be very cool.

-Upsilon

I make music!

My computer has a decent keyboard attached, with some good textures (the usual - regular piano noises, plus pads and synths). Am I to compose my bit myself, harmonizing off the melody you set up (which would be fine) or are you to give me a sheet of music to play (which would also be fine)?

Looking forwards to this! It will be very cool.

-Upsilon

Woops sorry for the late reply i will get Gold fish to have a look to.

Probably should have replied when I first saw this (Sorry) Is this the video project we we doing, or a new one of yours? Because Mr Upsilon here could also be another singer, maybe, given his latest video.

Probably should have replied when I first saw this (Sorry) Is this the video project we we doing, or a new one of yours? Because Mr Upsilon here could also be another singer, maybe, given his latest video.

I presume it's the video project you're taking part in, especially because your source material plays a very big role in this (not sure how much I should give away, as it seems as if this project is largely under wraps, right now).

I would love to have a little tiny singing bit. I think that would be a lot of fun.

I presume it's the video project you're taking part in, especially because your source material plays a very big role in this (not sure how much I should give away, as it seems as if this project is largely under wraps, right now).

Right, thought so. It does seem like the thread is keeping things quiet, so... To anyone else it is all .

(pic unrelated, just wanted the "classified" effect)

Unless you're interested in participating. For now,

I would love to have a little tiny singing bit. I think that would be a lot of fun.

The lyrics do call for two people... even more for the choir possibly...

The lyrics do call for two people... even more for the choir possibly...

This is true. So any kerbal players who can sing and might be interested, Pm L3GO, or myself.

Especially if you're a female one, as we are all guys here, and some balance would be nice.

I can sing, and play both the violin and a piano on a professional level.

I just need the damn equipment, damnit. I swear to god, one of these days I'm gonna rob a bank and use the money to buy myself some appropiate recording equipment. Maybe throw in an electric violin and a professional guitar while we're at it.

Sorry for the rant.
